moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Acid Spray
moves.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Struggle Bug
moves.description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.description: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to the user's HP.
